com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.configuration

Interface ClientEncryptionOptions.Builder

  • Enclosing interface:
    ClientEncryptionOptions

    public static interface ClientEncryptionOptions.Builder
    Builds instances of type ClientEncryptionOptions. Initialize attributes and then invoke the build() method to create an instance.

    ClientEncryptionOptionsBuilder is not thread-safe and generally should not be stored in a field or collection, but instead used immediately to create instances.

    Author:
    Dmytro Nosan
